inclusion.criterion: The etiology of portal hypertension is cirrhosis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients presenting with acute gastroesophageal variceal bleeding proven by emergency endoscopy within 12 hours.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: association with severe systemic illness, such as sepsis, COPD, uremia, HCC, > BCLC stage
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: failure in the control of bleeding by emergency endoscopic treatment.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has cirrhosis and recent UGIB. No severe systemic illness or failure to control bleeding.
